Question: Hexagro Urban Farming CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Hexagro Urban Farming

Living Farming Tree (LFT)

 - Indoor vertical garden product
 - Aims to provide healthy food access anywhere
 - Supports urban agriculture and local farmers
 - Promotes a circular, sustainable food system
 - Part of a hardware, software, and service platform
 - Accelerates adoption of vertical farming technologies
 - Ensures fresh produce delivery within six to eight hours of harvest
 - Contributes to nutritional security and circular economy principles
 - Showcased at CES 2024 for urban farming innovations

六边形城市农业

生活农业树（LFT）

- 室内垂直花园产品
- 致力于在任何地方提供健康食品
- 支持城市农业和本地农民
- 促进循环可持续的食物系统
- 是硬件、软件和服务平台的一部分
- 加速垂直农业技术的采纳
- 确保新鲜农产品在收获后6至8小时内送达
- 为营养安全和循环经济原则做出贡献
- 在CES 2024展示了城市农业创新技术
